svg.text: Higher Homotopy Equivalences in Unity Mathematics

g.text: Contractible Objects: Both ∞1 and ∞1+1 are homotopy equivalent to a point
Homotopy Equivalence: f: ∞1+1 → ∞1 with homotopy inverse g
f∘g ≃ id_∞1 and g∘f ≃ id_∞1+1 (with higher coherences)
💫 Higher Coherences: ∀k≥2, k-morphisms preserve unity structure
